description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Visitors from Africa in Bonn; King Baudouin and Queen Fabiola visit Belgian NATO troops in Germany; visit of the Guatemalan Foreign Minister; fashions from Berlin; nation-wide Mothers' Aide scheme; the 15th German Industries Fair in Hanover; a travelling exhibition of Germany's post-war development; public health; an alpine gliding school.
